sourcesContent:
/** @format */ import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { TextField, Box, Grid, Button, Typography } from "@mui/material"; import SaveIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Save"; import { LocalizationProvider, DateRangePicker, DatePicker } from "@mui/lab"; import AdapterDateFns from "@mui/lab/AdapterDateFns"; import { CreateMatter } from "../../api/MatterApi"; const NewMatter = () => { const matter_number = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10000000); const [matterData, setMatterData] = useState({ contact: "", matter_name: "", matter_type: "", matter_source: "", matter_status: "", assign_to: "", assign_by: "", billing_rate: "", alerts: "", open: null, closed: null, total_days: "", jurisdiction: "", status_limitaion: "", opposing_counsel: "", where: "", when: "", involved: "", witnesses: "", narrative: "", }); const { contact, matter_name, matter_type, matter_source, matter_status, assign_to, assign_by, billing_rate, alerts, open, closed, total_days, jurisdiction, status_limitaion, opposing_counsel, where, when, involved, witnesses, narrative, } = matterData; const TotalDays = () => { if (!((open == null) & (closed == null))) { // To calculate the time difference of two dates let Difference_In_Time = open.getTime() - closed.getTime(); // To calculate the no. of days between two dates let Difference_In_Days = Difference_In_Time / (1000 * 3600 * 24); total_days = Difference_In_Days; } }; const onChange = (e) => setMatterData({ ...matterData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const status = CreateMatter( contact, matter_name, matter_type, matter_source, matter_status, assign_to, assign_by, billing_rate, alerts, open, closed, total_days, jurisdiction, status_limitaion, opposing_counsel, where, when, involved, witnesses, narrative, ); console.log(status); }; return ( onSubmit(e)} > Create New Matter onChange(e)} id="contact" autoComplete="contact" sx={{ width: "97%", }} /> onChange(e)} id="matter_number" autoComplete="matter_number" disabled sx={{ width: "48%", }} /> onChange(e)} id="matter_name" autoComplete="matter_name" sx={{ width: "47%", }} /> onChange(e)} id="alerts" autoComplete="alerts" sx={{ width: "97%", }} /> onChange(e)} id="matter_type" autoComplete="matter_type" sx={{ width: "48%", }} /> onChange(e)} id="matter_source" autoComplete="matter_source" sx={{ width: "47%", }} /> onChange(e)} id="matter_status" autoComplete="matter_status" sx={{ width: "48%", }} /> onChange(e)} id="assign_to" autoComplete="assign_to" sx={{ width: "47%", }} /> onChange(e)} id="billing_rate" autoComplete="billing_rate" /> onChange(e)} renderInput={(params) => ( )} /> onChange(e)} renderInput={(params) => ( )} /> onChange(e)} id="total_days" autoComplete="total_days" disabled />
Legal Concerns
onChange(e)} id="jurisdiction" autoComplete="jurisdiction" /> onChange(e)} id="status_limitaion" autoComplete="status_limitaion" /> onChange(e)} id="opposing_counsel" autoComplete="opposing_counsel" /> Event Detail onChange(e)} id="where" autoComplete="where" /> onChange(e)} id="when" autoComplete="when" /> onChange(e)} id="involved" autoComplete="involved" /> onChange(e)} id="witnesses" autoComplete="witnesses" /> onChange(e)} id="narrative" autoComplete="narrative" /> ); }; export default NewMatter;
